entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
